trans-unit.source: Displays the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Exibe o conteúdo de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.

trans-unit.source: You typically use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> to specify where the content is to be added.
trans-unit.target: Você normalmente usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> para especificar onde o conteúdo a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> tipo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> em sua padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> object is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> objeto está em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedades obtém seus valores das propriedades dos mesmos nomes do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.

trans-unit.source: You can have the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property or binding to them.
trans-unit.target: Você pode ter o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> propriedade obter os valores dessas propriedades de outras propriedades do modelo pai, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> propriedade ou associação a eles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> uses the following logic to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> usa a lógica a seguir para exibir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>:

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> for definida, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> aplica-se que <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> propriedade e resultante <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> e seus elementos filho, se houver, são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objetos, consulte [visão geral de modelagem de dados](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> applies the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> for definida, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> aplica apropriada <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> propriedade e resultante <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> e seus elementos filho, se houver, são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: If there is a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> associated with the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> associado ao tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> aplica-se que <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> propriedade e resultante <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> e seus elementos filho, se houver, são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> é um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objeto, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> é exibido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> already has a parent, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> já tem um pai, ocorrerá uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> que converte o tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> para um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> usa <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> e resultante <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> é exibido.

trans-unit.source: If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain that string.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> que converte o tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> para uma cadeia de caracteres, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> usa <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> e cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> para conter a cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> é exibida.

trans-unit.source: If the content is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property is displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Se o conteúdo for um <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>, o valor da <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> propriedade é exibida em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain the string returned by <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> chama o <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> método no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> e cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> para conter a cadeia de caracteres retornada por <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> é exibida.

trans-unit.source: The following shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> <xref:System.Windows.Style> that sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: A seguir mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> <xref:System.Windows.Style> que define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> defines that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> appears as an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> within a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> define que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> aparece como um <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> marks that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> should be displayed and centered vertically and horizontally within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> marca que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> devem ser exibidos e centralizado verticalmente e horizontalmente dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> when this gets applied:
trans-unit.target: A imagem a seguir mostra a aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> quando isso é aplicado:

trans-unit.source: ![Button ControlTemplate sample](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "Button ControlTemplate sample")
trans-unit.target: ![Exemplo de botão ControlTemplate](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "exemplo ControlTemplate de botão")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: The size that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> object should use to arrange its child element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho que esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> deve usar para organizar seu elemento filho.

trans-unit.source: Positions the single child element and determines the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Posiciona o elemento filho único e determina o conteúdo de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: The actual size needed by the element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real necessário para o elemento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the template to use.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o modelo a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: This may depend on the content or other properties.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode depender do conteúdo ou outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The base class implements the following rules:
trans-unit.target: A classe base implementa as regras a seguir:

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> is set, use it.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> for configurado, usá-lo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> is set, call its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> for definido, chame seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If the result is not `null`, use it.
trans-unit.target: Se o resultado não é `null`, usá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Look for a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> whose <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> matches the content among the resources known to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> (including application, theme, and system resources).
trans-unit.target: Procure um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> cujo <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> corresponde ao conteúdo entre os recursos conhecidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> (incluindo recursos de aplicativo, tema e sistema).

trans-unit.source: If one is found, use it.
trans-unit.target: Se uma for encontrada, usá-lo.

trans-unit.source: If the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is "common", use a standard template.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> é "comum", use um modelo padrão.

trans-unit.source: The common types are `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos comuns são `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string and displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, use um modelo padrão que basicamente converte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> para uma cadeia de caracteres e o exibe em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem substituir essas regras e implementar seus próprios.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data used to generate the child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados usados para gerar os elementos filho de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" />.

trans-unit.source: The data used to generate the child elements.
trans-unit.target: Os dados usados para gerar os elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: When you place a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, it automatically displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the templated control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você coloca um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, exibe automaticamente a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> do controle modelado.

trans-unit.source: This means that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A> of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to be <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is implicitly bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is using that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que, se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A> de seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> ser <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> implicitamente está associado ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que está usando e que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.

trans-unit.source: To set up bindings for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> properties, you may want to consider using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar associações para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> propriedades, você talvez queira considerar o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> propriedade aponta para uma propriedade no modelo pai, bem como aliases de modelo associado e propriedades do modelo de seletor automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você usa `TemplateBinding` para associar esse valor de propriedade para um valor no controle modelado.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informações, consulte [extensão de marcação TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de base a ser usado durante o alias automático.

trans-unit.source: The base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: O nome de base a ser usado durante o alias automático.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Content".
trans-unit.target: O padrão é "Conteúdo".

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is in a template.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só deve ser usado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> está em um modelo.

trans-unit.source: When a template contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> set to "`Abc`", the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Quando um modelo contém uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> com <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> definido como "`Abc`", o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> são automaticamente um alias para `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, e `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> to "`Abc`" also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`.
trans-unit.target: Começando com o [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], configuração <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> para "`Abc`" também faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> propriedade precisa receber um alias para `AbcStringFormat`.

trans-unit.source: The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header".
trans-unit.target: Os dois valores mais úteis para essa propriedade são "Conteúdo" e "Cabeçalho".

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a style for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> that demonstrates the usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um estilo para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> que demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> propriedade:

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content" /> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres de composição que especifica como formatar a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content" />, se ela for exibida como uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content" /> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres de composição que especifica como formatar a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content" />, se ela for exibida como uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> pode ser um formato de cadeia de caracteres predefinidas, composto ou personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre formatos de cadeia de caracteres, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> propriedade será ignorada.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: Definir propriedades de metadados **true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo usado para exibir o conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> that defines the visualization of the content.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> que define a visualização do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informações, consulte [extensão de marcação TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um estilo para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> controle:

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" />, which allows the application writer to provide custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" />, que permite que o gravador de aplicativo forneça lógica personalizada para escolher o modelo usado para exibir o conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> object that supplies logic to return a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> que fornece lógica para retornar um <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> a ser aplicado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade será ignorada se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> está definida.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: An upper limit value that the return value should not exceed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de limite superior que o valor retornado não deve exceder.

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> object based on the sizing properties, margin, and requested size of the child content.
trans-unit.target: Determina o tamanho do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> com base nas propriedades de dimensionamento, na margem e no tamanho solicitado do conteúdo filho.

trans-unit.source: The size that is required to arrange child content.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho necessário para organizar o conteúdo filho.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Invocado quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Invocado quando o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" /> é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Invocado quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> object value.
trans-unit.target: O valor do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> antigo.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> object value.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" /> changes
trans-unit.target: Invocado quando o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate" /> é alterado

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> should use <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> in its style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> deve usar <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> no seu estilo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> should use <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> in its style; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> caso <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter" /> deva usar <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> no seu estilo; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> control:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um estilo para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> controle:

trans-unit.source: For more information about this example, see [CheckBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/checkbox-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre esse exemplo, consulte [modelos e estilos de caixa de seleção](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/checkbox-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.RecognizesAccessKey" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.RecognizesAccessKey" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property on instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o processo de serialização deve serializar o valor efetivo da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> em instâncias desta classe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector" /> precisar ser serializado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
